front.title: Speeder Bike Cannon
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your speeder bike, 2 on your swoop. Vehicle is power +2. May target a character, creature or vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny + 1 > defense value.
front.lore: Used for strafing runs during hit and fade tactics. Often difficult to target for an inexperienced pilot.
